sqlMap.select:
select
from SF_JD_REPORT where 1=1
SF_JD_REPORT.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where inputor=#inputor# and instance_id = SF_JD_REPORT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where inputor=#inputor# and instance_id = SF_JD_REPORT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where inputor =#inputor# and instance_id = SF_JD_REPORT.process_inst_id) and SF_JD_REPORT.STATUS!= 'cancel' and SF_JD_REPORT.STATUS != 'exec'
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#inputor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=SF_JD_REPORT.process_inst_id) or SF_JD_REPORT.process_inst_id = -1 ) and SF_JD_REPORT.STATUS ='0'
(SF_JD_REPORT.STATUS='exec')
1=1
order by SF_JD_REPORT.JD_REPOR_ID desc
